CustomField.inlineHelpText: What was the nature of your support issue?
CustomField.label: Nature of Issue

value.fullName: Training - needed to be taught/shown how to do something
value.label: Training - needed to be taught/shown how to do something

value.fullName: Technical - needed help with a technical problem or product malfunction
value.label: Technical - needed help with a technical problem or product malfunction

value.fullName: Administrative - needed help with something you were not able to do yourself in the SR Platform (i.e., reset password, enable a feature in the platform, change billing information, etc.)
value.label: Administrative - needed help with something you were not able to do yourself in the SR Platform (i.e., reset password, enable a feature in the platform, change billing information, etc.)
